verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul. <S%H5315><s%> O LORD <S%H3068><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> you are very <S%H3966><s%> great; <S%H1431><s%> you are clothed <S%H3847><s%> with honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty. <S%H1926><s%>
Who cover <S%H5844><s%> yourself with light <S%H216><s%> as with a garment: <S%H8008><s%> who stretch <S%H5186><s%> out the heavens <S%H8064><s%> like a curtain: <S%H3407><s%>

Who lays <S%H7760><s%> the beams <S%H7136><s%> of his chambers <S%H5944><s%> in the waters: <S%H4325><s%> who makes <S%H7760><s%> the clouds <S%H5645><s%> his chariot: <S%H7398><s%> who walks <S%H1980><s%> on the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind: <S%H7307><s%>
Who makes <S%H6213><s%> his angels <S%H4397><s%> spirits; <S%H7307><s%> his ministers <S%H8334><s%> a flaming <S%H3857><s%> fire: <S%H784><s%>
Who laid the foundations <S%H4349><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that it should not be removed <S%H4131><s%> for ever. <S%H5769><s%> <S%H5703><s%>
You covered <S%H3680><s%> it with the deep <S%H8415><s%> as with a garment: <S%H3830><s%> the waters <S%H4325><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
At <S%H4480><s%> your rebuke <S%H1606><s%> they fled; <S%H5127><s%> at <S%H4480><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your thunder <S%H7482><s%> they hurried <S%H2648><s%> away.

They go <S%H5927><s%> up by the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> they go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> by the valleys <S%H1237><s%> to the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H2088><s%> you have founded <S%H3245><s%> for them.

You have set <S%H7760><s%> a bound <S%H1366><s%> that they may not pass <S%H5674><s%> over; <S%H5674><s%> that they turn <S%H7725><s%> not again <S%H7725><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
He sends <S%H7971><s%> the springs <S%H4599><s%> into the valleys, <S%H5158><s%> which run <S%H1980><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the hills. <S%H2022><s%>
They give drink <S%H8248><s%> to every <S%H3605><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> of the field: <S%H7704><s%> the wild <S%H6501><s%> asses <S%H6501><s%> quench <S%H7665><s%> their thirst. <S%H6772><s%>
By them shall the fowls <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> have their habitation, <S%H7931><s%> which sing <S%H5414><s%> <S%H6963><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the branches. <S%H6073><s%>
He waters <S%H8248><s%> the hills <S%H2022><s%> from his chambers: <S%H5944><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your works. <S%H4639><s%>

He causes the grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> for the cattle, <S%H929><s%> and herb <S%H6212><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of man: <S%H120><s%> that he may bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> out of the earth; <S%H776><s%>

And wine <S%H3196><s%> that makes glad <S%H8056><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of man, <S%H582><s%> and oil <S%H8081><s%> to make his face <S%H6440><s%> to shine, <S%H6670><s%> and bread <S%H3899><s%> which strengthens <S%H5582><s%> man's <S%H582><s%> heart. <S%H3824><s%>
The trees <S%H6086><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> are full <S%H7654><s%> of sap; the cedars <S%H730><s%> of Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> which <S%H834><s%> he has planted; <S%H5193><s%>
Where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the birds <S%H6833><s%> make their nests: <S%H7077><s%> as for the stork, <S%H2624><s%> the fir <S%H1265><s%> trees are her house. <S%H1004><s%>
The high <S%H1364><s%> hills <S%H2022><s%> are a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for the wild <S%H3277><s%> goats; <S%H3277><s%> and the rocks <S%H5553><s%> for the conies. <S%H8227><s%>
He appointed <S%H6213><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> for seasons: <S%H4150><s%> the sun <S%H8121><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> his going <S%H3996><s%> down.
You make <S%H7896><s%> darkness, <S%H2822><s%> and it is night: <S%H3915><s%> wherein all <S%H3605><s%> the beasts <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> do creep <S%H7430><s%> forth.
The young <S%H3715><s%> lions <S%H3715><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> after their prey, <S%H2964><s%> and seek <S%H1245><s%> their meat <S%H400><s%> from God. <S%H410><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> rises, <S%H2224><s%> they gather <S%H622><s%> themselves together, and lay <S%H7257><s%> them down <S%H7257><s%> in their dens. <S%H4585><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> goes <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> to his work <S%H6467><s%> and to his labor <S%H5656><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the evening. <S%H6153><s%>

O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> manifold <S%H7231><s%> are your works! <S%H4639><s%> in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> have you made <S%H6213><s%> them all: <S%H3605><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of your riches. <S%H7075><s%>

So is this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> and wide <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> sea, <S%H3220><s%> wherein <S%H8033><s%> are things creeping <S%H7431><s%> innumerable, <S%H7342><s%> <S%H3027><s%> both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> beasts. <S%H2416><s%>
There <S%H8033><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> the ships: <S%H591><s%> there is that leviathan, <S%H3882><s%> whom you have made <S%H3335><s%> to play <S%H7832><s%> therein.
These wait <S%H7663><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> on you; that you may give <S%H5414><s%> them their meat <S%H400><s%> in due season. <S%H6256><s%>
That you give <S%H5414><s%> them they gather: <S%H3950><s%> you open <S%H6605><s%> your hand, <S%H3027><s%> they are filled <S%H7646><s%> with good. <S%H2896><s%>

You hide <S%H5641><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> they are troubled: <S%H926><s%> you take <S%H622><s%> away their breath, <S%H7307><s%> they die, <S%H1478><s%> and return <S%H7725><s%> to their dust. <S%H6083><s%>
You send <S%H7971><s%> forth your spirit, <S%H7307><s%> they are created: <S%H1254><s%> and you renew <S%H2318><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>
The glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall endure <S%H1961><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his works. <S%H4639><s%>
He looks <S%H5027><s%> on the earth, <S%H776><s%> and it trembles: <S%H7460><s%> he touches <S%H5060><s%> the hills, <S%H2022><s%> and they smoke. <S%H6225><s%>

I will sing <S%H7891><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> as long <S%H5704><s%> as I live: <S%H2416><s%> I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to my God <S%H430><s%> while <S%H5750><s%> I have my being. <S%H5750><s%>
My meditation <S%H7879><s%> of him shall be sweet: <S%H6149><s%> I will be glad <S%H8056><s%> in the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Let the sinners <S%H2400><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be no <S%H369><s%> more. <S%H5750><s%> Bless <S%H1288><s%> you the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> O my soul. <S%H5315><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the LORD. <S%H3050><s%>
